headline: Ask HN: Using Wordle solutions to test theories of morphic resonance
description:
Came across this tweet from broadcaster Hugh Fearnley Whittingstall today:

https://twitter.com/HughFW/status/1495685290698153986

I’m assuming the theory of morphic resonance is nonsense - but I’m wondering if there is any trend of Wordle average solution length by geography?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 使用Wordle解决方案来测试形态共振的理论
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 使用Wordle解決方案來測試形態共振的理論
description_zh-Hans:
今天看到广播员Hugh Fearnley Whittingstall的这条推文：

https://twitter.com/HughFW/status/1495685290698153986

我假设形态共振的理论是无稽之谈--但我想知道Wordle平均解长是否有按地域划分的趋势？
description_zh-Hant:
今天看到廣播員Hugh Fearnley Whittingstall的這條推文：

https://twitter.com/HughFW/status/1495685290698153986

我假設形態共振的理論是無稽之談--但我想知道Wordle平均解長是否有按地域劃分的趨勢？
